name: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Battle Operation Support Appli
name_original: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Battle Operation Support Appli
description:
Kidou Senshi Gundam: Battle Operation Support Appli is an action game. It came out on 02-07-2014. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Kidou Senshi Gundam: Battle Operation Support Appli is available on PS Vita.
